notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: L.v.d.F., E.S., and R.Z. designed the experiments, analyzed the data, wrote the paper. J.P.M.L., H.S., R.Z. contributed to the conception of the work. R.B., M.H.-v.d.M., J.D., Y.v.P. performed the experiments and analyzed the data. J.S. performed the statistical analyses. All authors reviewed, critiqued, provided comments, and approved the text.
